descriptive.question: Where is the [car_3]?
answer: The bed [car_3] is lying on is dark blue.

explanatory.question: Why are there cars there?
answer: Because the gymers need to know the time when they practice.
People drove here to roast the marshmallows.

predictive.question: What will [person_2] do after roasting the marshmallow?
answer: [person_2] will stop and have a rest.
reason: Because the rope was originally hung on the handle , but then the rope was no longer on the handle , so [person_2] wanted to untie the rope.
[person_2] wants to know if the roasted marshmallow is delicious.
Because it's dark outside [person_2] can't see clearly.

counterfactual.question: What would happen if [person_1] gives roasted marshmallows to others?
answer: [person_1] will leave the lecture hall quietly.
reason: Other people are having fun , if [person_1] goes back home , others would have to go back home , too.
[person_1] would give some marshmallows to him.
[person_1] has good manners and already grown up.
